properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well presented interior...
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5

properties.description:
Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat.
The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors and includes integrated appliances including a dishwasher & a washing machine. This large open plan benefits from bi folding doors onto a secluded private courtyard garden. Both bedrooms are double sized, and the family bathroom boasts a matching three piece suite a shower attachment over the bath. There is also a separate wet room. There are walnut doors throughout and wiring for Sky TV/aerial points in the living room/kitchen and both bedrooms.
This apartment being only five years old, is still under a 10 year building guarantee...

Well presented four bedroom family home situated close to local schools, bus routes and commuter links. The accommodation includes a bright reception room, separate dining area and a fitted kitchen with access to the rear garden. Upstairs offers four bedrooms and a family bathroom. Further benefits include double glazing, gas central heating and off-street parking...

A modern one bedroom apartment set within a well maintained development, ideally located for local amenities and transport. The property features an open plan living/kitchen area, a double bedroom and a contemporary bathroom. Additional benefits include secure entry system and good storage...

Charming two bedroom house located within easy reach of shops, parks and local transport. The property offers a reception room, fitted kitchen and a private rear garden. To the first floor are two bedrooms and a bathroom. A great option for first time buyers and downsizers...

Spacious three bedroom apartment presented in good order throughout. The accommodation comprises a generous reception room, fitted kitchen, three bedrooms and bathroom. The property further benefits from lift access and residents parking (where available) and is ideally positioned for commuter routes...

Substantial five bedroom detached home offering versatile living space. The property includes multiple reception rooms, a large kitchen/dining space and generous bedrooms arranged over two floors. Outside offers driveway parking and a landscaped garden. An ideal family home in a sought-after location...
